website_summaries.verdict: A four-pack of stainless steel can insulators of different colors.
pros: Works for both hot and cold beverages
Preserves temperature for longer than other materials
Silicone ring at the top can be removed for cleaning
Double wall of stainless steel helps maintain temperature
cons: Cans may slide around inside these coozies, especially if the cans are skinny

customer_reviews.title: I was shocked at how well they work.
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. I'm ridiculously picky, and I used to end up pouring out the last 1/4 of my Diet Coke cans because they just aren't as good once they start to warm up. Now they don't warm up. I was skeptical about these because they are so thin. But, I guess vacuum is vacuum. Now my sodas don't warm up while I'm drinking them. My wife bought me a single one of these and after two days I bought the 4-pack. Now I keep one at work and one at the fire station in addition to my house. They really work.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Edgemon

customer_reviews.title: Best Can cooler period!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 4 pack after testing 1 of these as a single purchase. The design is so simple compared to the competition and really keeps your beverage cold. It's thinner in your hand to hold, fits any cup holder and nothing to unscrew to load a new can. Decorate each can holder with your own decals to add the finishing touch. Nothing else compares! Get some!
customer_reviews.author: coolcat

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: These keep your 12oz standard can (not skinny cans) cold for a very long time. Never need a coaster again with these. There is an adjustment period to the weight of them as you will drink your whole drink but expect more because it's heavy (hard to explain but you will understand when it happens). I've had one for over 10 years. Unless you lose it, this is a one time purchase. My dad left his on the roof of his car and drove up the street. It fell off and someone ran over it with a lawn mower. I found it. He still uses it. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Delayed Gratification

customer_reviews.title: Will change the way you drink!
customer_reviews.text: I love discovering products that make every day activities so much more enjoyable. How much better can it get drinking a cold one right? Try drinking it out of one of these babies! It'll keep your drink cold way longer than you need it to with zero condensation skipping the minor annoyance. It's slim and comfortable to hold. I keep them at the ready in my fridge and I never drink any canned beverage without one. Here's another plus, fits in the car's cup holder! Makes a nice little gift.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Love them--you will too!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, for the price, you couldn't beat this! They are cheap, light, easy to hold, and yes, they DO fit in most cup holders in vehicles. I like the fact that they are color coded on the top--very easy to keep track of YOUR beverage. They are great for mowing the lawn or fishing on a hot, sunny, HUMID Minnesota summer day. I would absolutely recommend these to a friend. If I ever need more, I will not hesitate to purchase these again. Very well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher MN

customer_reviews.title: I don't drink from cans without one of these!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a single pack of these Thermos can holders, and I liked it enough to by a set of 4. They all work great. I rarely have a can of soda without using one. It makes a huge difference, especially in the car on hotter days. You can even fit some bottles into these holders.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wissman

customer_reviews.title: Very Cold Beer
customer_reviews.text: These really keep beer cold. They are just a hair too big to snuggley hold CoorsLight or Corona. They fit miller and bud perfectly. Wish they had a thin flap of silicone inside to fit the smaller bottles and cans. I keep mine in the freezer for an extra cold punch.
customer_reviews.author: Denahood

customer_reviews.title: These are the best coozies available.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a single one of these ~5 years ago and use it daily, so after years of dents and dings, I had to buy another when I saw they came in a 4 pack. These coozies are amazing. A bottle of water will stay cold for hours in it, and a can of whatever will stay cold even longer. I wish that I could buy one of these with neo magnets on the bottom for when I am mowing.
customer_reviews.author: welder123

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates anything like this, usually because they're bulky and ugly. But he loves these and says I was so smart to buy them! ;-) I keep them in the freezer although that isn't necessary. They don't sweat. They keep the drink as cold as it was when you opened it, although in truth, the beverage doesn't last too long! Very nice looking. I would love to give this as a gift and I will when the occasion arises. Quality product. Fits in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Love my can cooly, it goes with me everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I've always used can cozys. But as we all know they fall apart quickly and get dirty real easy. These stainless steel ones are not only completely durable but they keep you beverage much cooler, they can be easly cleaned, They fit perfectly into any vehicle cup holder and from what I've seen they come in a lot of different styles and sizes. Honestly, I cant see how this thing would break unless it got ran over by a tire somehow!?! I started out ordering 1 to try it and I know kinda have myself a little collection, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: NOT ideal for cold beers at the backyard BBQ! No seal, drinks spill. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: One broke the second it hit the linoleum. The other issue with this product is that there are no grips or cloth, so it freezes your hand. It keeps drinks semi cold, but I haven't noticed a difference. Also on sunny days it warms the can up super quick, having the opposite intended affect. I wanted this for cold beers at BBQs...welp, evidently itll be used indoors to keep drinks cooler a few minutes more🤷🏻‍♀️ also, it has no grip or seal so cans fall out easily. Too much hassle returning. Annoyed, feeling like it was worth more like $10/15..but, lesson learned.🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Ravenn

customer_reviews.title: These keep our drinks super cold when we're outside
customer_reviews.text: Summer is officially here now that we have our can coolers. These keep our drinks super cold when we're outside. Yesterday it was hot out and the can coolers kept our sodas and waters cold all day. It will be perfect when we head out into the super hot weather. I'm using these in the backyard, taking these to the beach and brought them to the pool. I really like that there's a different color on each can so there's no mistaking which one is mine.
customer_reviews.author: R.Pop

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned two of these for a while now, and they are so popular that I often have to go searching for one, so I upped my inventory with this four pack. looking forward to having one ready to use whenever I need one. Pro Tip. Keep these in the freezer when not in use, so they don't wick cold from your can when you place the can in the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Angel75c

customer_reviews.title: This thermos keeps your drink nice and cold.
customer_reviews.text: When you put a cold drink in it, the coosie itself gets cold and I like that. The Drink stays colder so much longer. I've started putting my cans inside the thermos while inside the fridge. I grab one on my way out and it stays cold for over an hour. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat, I should have bought two sets to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice and slim. Fits car cup holder.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this with the intention of keeping my drinks cold while I’m drinking it. I’ve haven’t tested in extreme conditions or for 10 hours. But it keeps it cool while you left your drink in the car to go shopping or when you forget your drink for a while. If you wanna keep it cold for longer I recommend to buy a bottle or a cup with a lid and just dispense your drink in there. With more use I’ll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Tati Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I wonder why I bother reading reviews. These beverage holders are not worth it. They may keep your drink at a cool temperature but not cold! Not even for 30 mins! Severely disappointed considering it’s winter time! Forget about the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for a couple of decades now. The rubber tops finally came loose but a bit of silicone and all is well again. I give these as gifts and people are amazed when their drinks are cold a couple hrs later. I take mine with me always as I do NOT like warm beverages. Put your favorite sticker on them and you know which one is yours. Well, this is a colored four pack but before they've always been a two pack of the same color. Money well spent! One note, I normally drink bottles that are smaller than these and it still keeps them cold for a long long time!
customer_reviews.author: Tim K.

customer_reviews.title: works very well!
customer_reviews.text: best purchase ever!! the weight of the Koozie will make you think you have more drink left in your can, but it will end up being less. this kinda causes you to drink more, so watch out when drinking beer!! bottom line, these keep your can significantly colder than other Koozies. they dont sweat or anything. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Much Nicer Looking Than Foam Insulators
customer_reviews.text: These insulators perform well, are reasonably priced, and look a lot sleeker than my drawer full of foam insulators. They also fit small hands a little better. However, the foam insulators, which I regularly get for free, seem to hold the cold about as well.
customer_reviews.author: DWK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put cans in and take them out. Keeps drinks cold for hours.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the popular screw-top insulators bc it’s just extra work for a beer or soda that you’ll finish in less than 10 minutes anyway. Cans fit snugly with these insulators and are easy to slip in and out. I like the multi colors too. I wish they made them for slim cans like hard sparkling drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviewers I have not done a temp comparison but I love these things
customer_reviews.text: A. They look awesome regardless of whether they insulate better or not B. Love the grip and color C. Grip sometimes comes up from the metal but is easily pushed back down--to me a non-issue D. A very cool gift to bring to beach vacations
customer_reviews.author: J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Best can insulator!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am huge fan of their competitor for my drinking cups. However, we absolutely love this can holder over any other type we have tried. It keeps our drinks cold, even in our 100+ Texas heat summer temps. It wins on ease and convience, as you don't have to screw on a top, and its super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S&B

customer_reviews.title: Expecting more
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to do the job of keeping my beverage cool, but I suppose with the great reviews I was expecting it to be even colder. Maybe I am unrealistic. Granted, we were in the desert and it was hot outside. I know it kept it cooler than if the can were not in anything, but again I was expecting it to remain colder than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Real Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These work surprisingly well. Definitely keep your beverage cooler longer. And they don’t sweat. Also make good gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I already wrote a review on the individual one that I bought a year or so ago. These are amazing!!!! They really do keep your beverage cooler longer and your hands don't get cold in the process. Plus, I love the color coding so now 5 people have their beverages covered when we camp and it reduces the waste!
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work doesn't make the drinks last any longer and your mouth is always hitting the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these can holders. I have had one with a black top for several years now. I saw these with the colorful tops and decided I needed them! :) I also gave one to my elderly mother who also loves it. These keep a can of Coke or whatever cold for a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really work!
customer_reviews.text: i wasnt completely sold on these, but after having used them for a couple hot weekends by the pool im am now! Regular coozies are useless. These keep my drink cold for easily as long as it takes me too drink it. Difference is really noticeable over thise soft coozies. Would definitely reccomend and by again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ronnenburg

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement with flexible cap for Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because the silicon ring is adjustable and slides up or down to grip your can. Taller cans aren’t blocked like they are in the Y**i brand, so they fit for many can sizes and bottles. Good value, they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: SkyyeBlue

customer_reviews.title: These were used on a beach vacation in Florida. ...
customer_reviews.text: These were used on a beach vacation in Florida. They keep drinks cold for a very long period of time! There isn't a lid that screws on so I was worried about cans falling out, but that didn't happen. There were no issues with these at all.
customer_reviews.author: sonyak

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink cold longer
customer_reviews.text: These really work to keep the drink cold. Works perfect for any can
customer_reviews.author: Mcb546

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these. We live in Texas and they keep his beer cold while or in the hot Texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A

customer_reviews.title: Great! And lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold beside the bed almost all night. Only slight downside is it's a but heavy so you think you have some left but it's empty.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverages colder longer
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago and lost it but was super excited when I found this four pack! Keeps cans super cold without being super expensive like a YETI or other similar ones. I love the color options - can easily tell who's is who's when drinking the same beverages
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: They have kept our drinks cool and it was a great price point
customer_reviews.text: We keep these in our wine fridge so they are ready to use as soon as we crack open a can. They have kept our drinks cool and it was a great price point. I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Little Dot

customer_reviews.title: Better than not having a holder
customer_reviews.text: If giving it 3 stars meant that the holder kept my can cold slightly longer than no holder, 4 means it keeps it cold a little longer than "slightly." Not for more than a half hour or 45 mins, however. So having a holder is better than not having one.
customer_reviews.author: kdiller

customer_reviews.title: The best out there !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for years..... nothing else compares !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: honda-davidson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Insulation is really good. It was good as a gift to friends.
customer_reviews.author: SANGPYO H.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I have used this same product for over ten years. The Thermos brand has fulfilled its advertising. A cold drink placed in this product stays cold longer than anything else I have used. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Betty krocker

customer_reviews.title: ITEM KEEPS BEERS & DRINKS COLD!
customer_reviews.text: The rubber top/ color is helpful to separate getting yours mixed up with other peoples. Rubber top is good for gripping your drink, which helps for slip resistance when holding. I give these to my friends as gifts & they use them while golfing to keep their beer cold.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Pickens

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! Bought for use on a boat in the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Bought for use on a boat in the Arizona summer heat. They keep 12oz canned drinks nice and cold. Also fits plastic water bottles pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Wessel Family

customer_reviews.title: Pertty nice
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect gift and they love them Iight weight and very slim fits most cans great. The rubber does remove I would avoid it though it stretches it out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly! Keeps my drink cold for hours and the price is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Husband is obsessed great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Great buy drinks cold for hours, holds water bottles and some beer bottles
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work almost as good as advertised, which is saying something compared to other can coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all your canned or bottled drinks cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps all your canned or bottled drinks cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. We use them all the time. Love the colors
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Ray Powers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product, ive had some of these for over 10 years and use them daily. Was happy to find them back on the market again. And unlike most others these will still fit in a cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have had others and family keeps taking them home with them! Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things!! Keeps cans cold for couple hours, fits in car cup holders, and now I can drink my cold drink at a leisurely pace. If you like drinks out of a can cold then you need to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with the bottom rubber gasket and bottle holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would be the same a the Chilling the Most thermos product, and they don't come with all the accessories
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adair

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: They do not last the 10 hours advertised. They are convenient for taking my lunch to work.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard size cans like a glove but...
customer_reviews.text: My lips actually touch the rubber tops which I don't really like. Coors lite that my wife drinks are a bit slimmer and taller so there is space between can and insulator and can is not secure
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Standard cans only
customer_reviews.text: Works great on standard sized cans. Thinner cans and bottles wobble and can slip out. Otherwise works as good as a yeti for 1/8 the price
customer_reviews.author: Kamfree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought these years ago. I love my soda cold and these work! Hours later it's like I just took it from the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaBurger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome no cap to screw on fits in cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Does Not stay cold very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it is suppose to stay cold for 10 hours. I have used these can holders several times since I bought them and the most it kept my drink cold was 1 hour only. I am very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your canned beverages cold for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I highly recommend. Keeps your canned beverages cold for hours!
customer_reviews.author: L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things are cool but sometimes you get a little condensate dribble down your chin
customer_reviews.author: S. Stuck

customer_reviews.title: wish they fit a coors light can
customer_reviews.text: These work great on your standard aluminum can, but are a little too big for Coors Light cans.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: As good as Yeti..
customer_reviews.text: These are really excellent quality. Keeps my beer cold and no water rings left behind on the table! Would recommend, just as good as Yeti, without the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C Scheirer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They work great and a perfect size. Fit all cup holders and much nicer to hold. Everyone that uses one asks where they can get some
customer_reviews.author: Karen Owens

customer_reviews.title: Holders not good in direct sun.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I wasted my money. These holders are not insulated! The metal heats up in the sun, warming your drink and burning your fingers. They are fine inside, keeps condensation off hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thermos can insulators
customer_reviews.text: I have used more expensive similar thermos holders. These work just as well and the price is so much better. Cans fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: colleen Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverage cold!
customer_reviews.text: I love them they keep my beverage cold even outside when it's hot and humid..I love them and would like to order more when they are back in stock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the slim design
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other popular brand, this is much better. Slim design is perfect for holding and fitting in cup holders. Keeps can cold for hours, even left in hot car.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These coolers work great finally a product that really keeps your drink cold
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Better than Yeti
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Light weight and effective at keeping can beverages cold!! Work great at the beach!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great for value!
customer_reviews.text: Made these into Christmas gifts with added vinyl decals, they looked awesome and were the perfect small gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Greenstein.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! Some of the best koozies around
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! Some of the best koozies around! Keeps the drink soooo cold!!! Probably will buy another set. A must have to be in the backyard around our pool and/or when camping and on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for vacation. I wish they would float but otherwise keeps my beverage cold in 100+ temps
customer_reviews.author: brian strobel

customer_reviews.title: These are great!! I was replacing some that I had ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! I was replacing some that I had for a very long time. Love the colors so that everyone knows which is theirs!
customer_reviews.author: Terri G. Sprayberry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy cold canned beverages and but hate ice watering your beverage, I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: glennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work like a charm. They're wonderful on a hot summer day on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: These do not keep your beverage cold for more than an hour. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: COORS can does not fit snug.
customer_reviews.text: COORS can does not fit snug. Otherwise it is a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beer cold!
customer_reviews.text: These are great !! Affordable, best thing is the self loading, it eases it way to the bottom. Great for all drinks.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT MARLEY

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...
customer_reviews.text: This works. Really holds cold well. My beer and my girl friend 's water bottles stay cold with these holders. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald sellar

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with our Thermos Stainless Vacuum Insulated containers. Keeps drinks cold. Recommend for sure!

customer_reviews.title: Steel pop can holders.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my car drink holders. Are easier to hold also.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K Butts

customer_reviews.title: I ordered one at first and i loved it so much i ordered more
customer_reviews.text: These work so well. I ordered one at first and i loved it so much i ordered more. Very easy to use. I wont drink a soda without one

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have the right can.. it doesn't fit.....like a coors light

customer_reviews.text: Very good compering to other brands like Yeti which it very expensive

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, looks cool does what is needed. Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a 4 pack. Keeps my drinks cold and my hands not!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! It keeps my beer cold, especially in hot weather!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandmother!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our grandmother who lives with us. She sits with a soda or seltzer next to her and these keep her drink cold and her hands warm! Great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: John Allen Zebell

customer_reviews.title: best coolie yet!
customer_reviews.text: love these...got a promo one some time back and bought four more for tailgating and long drives.
customer_reviews.author: neatnick

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: These things are the best! Awesome quality and keeps the drink cold! I have bought a total 12 of these cups for myself, friends and family. Do not pay $40 for a Yeti ...these are equally as good, maybe better!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your cans and bottles cool for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Fits in cup holder
customer_reviews.text: These are the best and especially because the still fit into a standard cup holder even with the can or bottle in them and the product stays cold for hours.

customer_reviews.title: fits into cup holders
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents so they can put their drinks in the cup holders on their 4wheeler.

customer_reviews.title: Thermo part
customer_reviews.text: Like the colors and cans fit perfectly. Drinks stay cold a lot longer. Super....

customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the Yeti cozy. Very impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! And not as heavy as most others!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold, fits in a cup holder, and much better price than Yeti.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Keep your cans cold for much longer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I know the advertised 10 hours may have been a little too much to ask for, but I don't feel like it comes anywhere close to that mark. I don't feel like these keep my drinks colder any longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Migs1124

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not what i thought it was. for cans, not food.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Rodolph

customer_reviews.title: looked like they had lids to me
customer_reviews.text: Photos were a bit deceiving, looked like they had lids to me, but return was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Thermos 12 oz, Multicolor Stainless Vacuum 12 Ounce Can Insulator, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Keep your beverage cans cold for up to 10 hours with this beverage can insulator from Thermos The holder has a durable stainless steel interior and exterior with a sweat proof design so you do not have to worry about water rings or freezing your hands The compact design with rubber grip is comfortable and easy to hold Non-slip base prevents slipping and scratching and the silicone ring quickly secures the can in the insulator Plus the holder fits most automobile cup holders so you can use it while you are commuting The assortment includes 4 can insulators in lime blue red and black
feature_bullets: Compact design with rubber grip is comfortable and easy to hold
Thermos vacuum insulation technology for maximum cold temperature retention Keeps cold up to 10 hours
Assortment includes 4 can insulators in lime blue red and black
Non-slip base prevents slipping and scratching Silicone ring quickly secures can

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars711 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
